price: তোমালোকে ইচ্ছা কৰিব নোৱাৰা, যেতিয়ালৈকে বিশ্বজগতৰ প্ৰতিপালক আল্লাহে ইচ্ছা নকৰে।
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
